note.p: Daughter of Richard Litchfield and his wife Sarah Elizabeth Buckley; sister of Richard Buckley Litchfield. Married Arthur Loftus Steele (1815/16–93), captain in the East India Company, a widower with one son, in 1853.

Gloucestershire, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1938 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 June 2020)
